1.content:
The First thing we need to know is who you are?

-Scott Maxwell: 25 year old Scott has had a rather difficult time as of late. His girlfriend of 4 years just broke up with him, his mother died of a heart attack, and his job cut his hours to part time due to cutbacks. He is 5'6 with dark brown hair, hazel eyes, and an average build.

-Emily Smith: Emily has been through a lot. The 23 year old never had a good childhood. She was constantly ridiculed by her parents, was constantly told she wouldn't amount to anything, and has suffered for her parents ruining her life for years. She is 5'2 with black hair, green eyes, and is slightly chubby.

-Kimberly May: Kim, 20, has a seething hatred towards her family. Due to her family's wealth, she was held to unreasonable standards growing up, and was constantly told the could do better. When Kim came out as gay, her family disowned her, kicked her out of her home, and left her on the streets. She is 4'5 with blonde hair, hazel eyes, and after living on the streets for close to 4 years, she is rather skinny.

-Evan Luke: At 21, Evan has had a bit of luck. Having a home, car, and a descent job, Evan hasn't had luck in other departments. He was an orphan until he was 18, hasn't had much in terms looks, and struggles with women. at 5'5, he has light brown hair, brown eyes, and has a descent amount of muscle.
1.title: Who are you?

choices: Go do laundry, and use flirt on the counter girl.
14.content:
The day starts off like any other at your apartment. You wake up,shave, shower, brush teeth, etc. It's going to be a good day, at least in your terms. You have to day off from your job at the warehouse, and you intend to take full advantage of it to get some things taken care of. There are quite a few things you need to do in fact.

First, you need to return a vacuum cleaner to your neighbor, Claire Scoot. If you're being honest, though, Claire is a bombshell. She's about the same age as you, she has an amazing body with large breasts, wide hips, a large ass, and only a little bit of a gut. Pair that with her long, wavy red hair, green eyes, and plump lips, and she's a perfect. It is a bit surprising that she is a single mother, having gotten pregnant when she was 13, and has an adorable 8 year old.

Second, you got your work clothes dirty the night before, and didn't really intend to. What can you say, you had to pick up a box that had been covered in dirt. That said, the counter girl in the laundry room has an adorable face, and is only a year younger. She may not be Claire Scoot hot, but she's very cute, especially when she has her glasses on. You might try your luck and ask her out, though you know she'll say no.

You've a number of other things as well, but these are pretty close to your apartment.
14.title: Evan Luke

info.brief_description: You awake one morning with the powers of a god. How are things going to go?
info.description:
You are a regular everyday guy, or gal, that has had it rough for years. You're lucky to be where you're at now. Things However seem to feel different one day, as if you can do whatever you want to anything.

This is a Fetish story, but not everything goes.
RULES:
1. The main character is the only one with these powers. He cannot give powers to another person.
2. No giant/giantess growth. the Character can grow some, however becoming a 1000 ft tall giant and wrecking everything because you can is a no go.
3. Vore is allowed, however scat is not.
4. The main Character cannot permanently die. They are generally immortal by this point, and their wounds can heal, but that doesn't mean they are unkillable. If they are killed by something, they are able to possess another entity.
5. No one word chapters, they will be removed. Please put some level of effort into it.
6. No run on sentences.
7. No transforming characters into actors or actresses.
